players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie's death is a tragedy. We must be cautious and share observations to find the mafia among us."
You: "I agree, Bob. Charlie's death is concerning. We should all share our thoughts to find any inconsistencies."
Diana: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it."
You: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Bob last night—he's the mafioso. We must vote Bob out."
Diana: "Alice is lying. I investigated her and she is the mafioso. Bob, if you are the detective, you should have investigated me or Alice, not Bob. Alice is trying to deflect suspicion."
Bob: "I believe Diana. Alice's claim doesn't add up - why would she investigate me first night? Voting Alice."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie's death is a tragedy. We must be cautious and share observations to find the mafia among us."
Alice: "I agree, Bob. Charlie's death is concerning. We should all share our thoughts to find any inconsistencies."
Diana: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it."
Alice: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Bob last night—he's the mafioso. We must vote Bob out."
Diana: "Alice is lying. I investigated her and she is the mafioso. Bob, if you are the detective, you should have investigated me or Alice, not Bob. Alice is trying to deflect suspicion."
You: "I believe Diana. Alice's claim doesn't add up - why would she investigate me first night? Voting Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie's death is a tragedy. We must be cautious and share observations to find the mafia among us."
Alice: "I agree, Bob. Charlie's death is concerning. We should all share our thoughts to find any inconsistencies."
You: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it."
Alice: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Bob last night—he's the mafioso. We must vote Bob out."
You: "Alice is lying. I investigated her and she is the mafioso. Bob, if you are the detective, you should have investigated me or Alice, not Bob. Alice is trying to deflect suspicion."
Bob: "I believe Diana. Alice's claim doesn't add up - why would she investigate me first night? Voting Alice."
